channel.title: Server help and command help
channel.description:
ok what i have problems with is my server and commands.
1. SERVER- what happens is i log into my server with "runserver" and change the port. then when i try to get people in it says its down. so i made a (ham) and it still dont let ppl in....
2.COMMANDS-(testscape) i am a total noob i dont no how to add and edit tele commands and commands to get stuff can some1 send me the info to make commands.. also i have no idea how ppl do this but i would like a "master code"
CAN SOMEONE PLEASE HELP ME
